title: A Brand New Character Is Joining ‘The Rookie’ For Season 2
text:
After Castle ended, we were wondering when we would get our Nathan Fillion fix again. Thankfully, The Rookie came along. Now in its second season, it's quickly becoming one of our favorite shows. The reason? It has to be the stellar cast.

The first episode of the sophomore season just aired this fall and we can't wait for the next. To tide you over, we're taking a deep dive into the cast and giving you a little recap on what their characters are up to. Here's what you need to know about talented group of actors who make up the cast of The Rookie.
